p: The genus Litsea Lam. consists of around 300 species distributed in tropical and warm subtropical regions of Asia, Australia, and the Americas [ 19]. Litsea viridis H. Liu is a small tree, 3-6 m tall, found in south-eastern Yunnan province (China) and Cao Bằng, Nghệ An, Đà Nẵng, and Đắk Lắk provinces (Vietnam) [ 12, 14]. There do not seem to be any previous studies on the phytochemistry of this plant.
